alert.note: Alert for Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 12:05PM EST until February 05 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive runoff continues. * WHERE...A portion Transylvania county. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EST. * IMPACTS...River or streamflows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1204 PM EST, Flooding of low lying areas along the French Broad River around Brevard and downstream will linger through this afternoon, as well as select tributaries, such as the Little River. - Some locations that may experience lingering flooding include... Brevard, Dupont State Forest, Penrose, Little River In Transylvania County, Connestee and North Transylvania. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
